parameters.description: Connector's credentials that are required to execute on a Key-Value object or a string if they are encrypted

webhookUrl.description: Url to be notified of item changes

clientUserId.description: Client's external identifier for the user, it can be a ID, UUID or even an email. This is free for clients to use.

oauthRedirectUri.description: Redirect URI required for the Oauth flow

products.description: Products to be collected in the connection

avoidDuplicates.description: Avoids creating a new item if there is already one with the same credentials
